title: Team Royalty Gold Recruiting
body:
Hello fam
Team Royalty Gold is currently looking for Players who are free on most nights from the times between 7pm -9pm and free on some weekends for possible scrims and we are commited 

We are looking for a mature player who will voice his mind when need be. We as a team understand that we will go through things which maybe hard and we want to work through it as a team. In saying that you must be able to communicate.

You have to be diamond or higher since we be playing in the OOL tourney
Add me in game if u are keen i believe my Friend list is full but u can still try to add me or just message me down there
